comments: When binding a Text to a model attribute that has an intial value of null ObservableTextValue throws a NPE when updating the view.  In "updateListener" it assumes that oldValue != null.  I'll attach a JUnit that throws the Exception.

Created an attachment (id=37619)
JUnit that throws NPE

Created an attachment (id=37693)
TextObservableValue patch

Swapped the comparison from:

"!oldValue.equals(newValue)"

to:

"!newValue.equals(oldValue)"

newValue comes from text.getText() and this value will never be null according to the SWT javadoc.  Passes the previously attached test and the tests in TextControlScenario.
